summary: This bill, the Runaway and Homeless Youth and Trafficking Prevention Act of 2025, reauthorizes and amends the Runaway and Homeless Youth Act. It focuses on providing safe shelter and services for runaway, homeless, and street youth, including trauma-informed care and substance use disorder prevention. The bill also addresses youth trafficking, expands eligibility for services, strengthens data collection, and authorizes appropriations for various programs, including prevention services.
